name: The First Law
description:
Made for Mini Jam #111

Newton's first Law of Motion states that an object in motion will stay in motion unless acted upon by an outside force.

You are piloting a heavily-armed ship in an endlessly-looping field of strangely prismatic asteroids that can only be destroyed by attacks of the same color.

Try not to hit yourself too much, kay?

Featuring:

- Asteroids-style gameplay, complete with wonky space movement

- 6 different weapons to inevitably hit yourself with

- Adaptive BGM, 'cause I'm a sucker for that stuff
